enable-archive.label: Turn on pinned post archiving
enable-archive.helpText: If enabled, pinned posts will be locked automatically when unpinned.

for-all-pinned.label: Turn on for all pinned posts
for-all-pinned.helpText: If enabled, all pinned posts will be locked when unpinned. If disabled, only posts with specific flairs or titles will be locked.

archive-flair-list.label: Post flair list
archive-flair-list.helpText: Comma (,) separated list of flairs (case-sensitive) for pinned posts you want to lock automatically when unpinned. NOTE: The "Turn on for all pinned posts" setting overrides this one.

archive-title-list.label: Post title keyword/phrase list
archive-title-list.helpText: Comma (,) separated list of keywords or phrases (case-sensitive) for titles of pinned posts you want to lock automatically when unpinned. NOTE: The "Turn on for all pinned posts" setting overrides this one.

enable-unlock.label: Unlock when pinned
enable-unlock.helpText: If enabled, posts will be unlocked automatically when pinned. The options above for post flair and title would also apply. Useful for accidental unpins.
